frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-transparent-top-bar-adjustable-transparency
frozen.longDescription:
Fork of: https://github.com/zhanghai/gnome-shell-extension-transparent-top-bar

Bring back the transparent top bar in GNOME Shell with adjustable transparency.

Does not work well with custom shell themes.
